title: GoErie.com: Local News, Politics & Sports in Erie, PA
text:
Which Erie religious leader once met the future Pope Leo XIV?

One Erie bishop met the new pope almost a decade ago in Rome. Another bishop with local ties is going to Pope Leo XIV's inauguration Mass at Vatican.
